comments:
Description:
NPE when double click runtime error in Problem View
Build number:2.3.0.v20071129

Steps to reproduce:
1. New datasource and dataset.
2. Drag dataset to Layout.
3. Add a blank group to the table.
4. Preview.
5. Back to Layout and double click the runtime error in Problem View

Expected result:
No exception and just open the exception dialog to display detail information.

Actual result:
NPE.

Error log:
